page.title: 18MALBOROUGH FOOTBALL CLUB
page.content: In September 1984, {Harry Jevons,}a local resident of{Malborough,}founded an under 12's football club.It was not all{Malborough}children in the team. Some children came from{Salcombe, Hope {Cove,Galmpton}and{Thurlestone.}Our club consists of 28 to 32 players. This is the team that normally plays. {L.Watts, D.Prowse, S.Fisher, A.Yeoman, {S.Redford, S.Pike, C.Jones, M.Perring, {N.Lapthorn, P.Harris, G.Jones, {L.Perring, and R.Rendle.}In the League there are eight teams. They are{ {Torquay Hungarians, Buckfastleigh, {South Brent, Kingsbridge Minors, {Kingsbridge Colts, Manstow Rangers, {Manstow Utd,}and{Malborough.}The Final table at the end of the season was 1st{Torquay,}6th{Malborough,}and last of all were{Manstow Utd.}In the Tony Rogers Cup,{Torquay Hungarians}also won.
